Name: AKOA SECTOR POLO SHIRT
Description: The Akoa Sector polo shirt is perfect for everyday sports wear. The Endura-Dri fabric is a generation of high performance Akoa fabrics designed to cope with the most challenging conditions. The side panels feature an eyelet fabric for cooling comfort.

Name: AKOA SECTOR CONTRAST TOP SOCK
Description: The Akoa Sector contrast top sock has an elasticated top that eliminates the need for tie ups and can be worn under or over the knee. Name: DAVID LUKE ECO POLO SHIRT
Description: The David Luke Eco poloshirt contains polyester made from non-biodegradable plastic drinking bottles, which would otherwise end up in landfill. Durable and affordable, this poloshirt is a perfect addition to any uniform. Easy to care for just machine wash and tumble dry.

Name: DAVID LUKE ECO SENIOR BOYS' BERMUDA SHORTS
Description: The David Luke Eco Flat Front Classic Shorts are made from approximately 4 recycled plastic bottles which is over 30% of the Polyester material used.They feature a half elasticated back with a single hook and bar zip fly. These shorts are comfortable but practical.

Name: DAVID LUKE ECO JUNIOR BOYS' BERMUDA SHORTS
Description: The David Luke Eco Bermuda length shorts contain polyester made from non-biodegradable plastic drinking bottles, which would otherwise end up in landfill. Name: DAVID LUKE ECO SENIOR DROP WAIST KNIFE PLEAT SKIRT

Name: DAVID LUKE ECO SENIOR STRAIGHT SKIRT
